category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_NX_UGPART_create_pam_pattern
preference.preference_description:
Defines the pattern string of the names of new UGPART dataset objects during a "create" operation. When user selects physical architecture modeler(pam)tab and creates a pam part, this pattern string will be used to create the dataset name. Values may contain text, incremental numbering format and also refer to the content of some of the object's properties using the ${PropertyName} format, with PropertyName being ItemID or RevisionID. The incremental numbering format will consist of two values separated by a colon: * The first value is the start number (typically '1'). * The second value is the number of digits to show. If the number of digits specified is more than the number of digits in the start value, then the value will be padded with zeros on the left.
Example: Let us consider the preference value "pam${1:3}-${ItemID}/${RevisionID}",pam stands for physical architecture modeler. Suppose a user is creating item revision 001234/A. new UGPART dataset name is generated by replacing the ${ItemID} and ${RevisionID} with the new revision and ItemID in the pattern. The new UGPART dataset would be created as "pam001-001234/A".
